alert.note: Alert for East Laramie County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 3:55PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Kimball, southwestern Banner and east central Laramie Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 354 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Albin, or 27 miles northwest of Kimball, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Albin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
